content:
Welcome to #Confluence Pilot.

Description: For discussions relating to Confluence rollout

@Lorraine Constable Good morning, I know that we had discussed creating a Jira Project for Space Requests, but after creating a Space where WorkGroups can sign up to be migrated to Confluence, I'm wondering what Space Request we'd actually be getting? If it is mainly for features I think we should stick to emailing webmaster@hl7.org because 1. it simplifies the process instead of create another approval process or repository 2. i think the tendency of confused people to request things that already exist will pile sky high if we provide them a golden path to do so. Just thoughts.. Let me know what you think.

I'd prefer a smaller number of spaces than a larger. We can automatically set up one space per work group. I think we should have criteria for whether the introduction of additional spaces is necessary/appropriate.
(Given that access permissions are going to be the same across all work groups, I'm not totally clear on the need for separate spaces per work group either...)
